title: HTML for Beginners
creator: Ashraf Asif
description: This course introduces HTML, covering all the basic aspects and functionalities to help you create your first website.

instructor.name: Ashraf Asif
instructor.bio: Ashraf Asif has been a front-end developer for over 10 years, specializing in HTML and CSS. He is passionate about teaching and has helped thousands of students begin their careers in web development.

title: CSS for Beginners
creator: Chitra Prakash
description: Learn how to style websites using CSS, from basic techniques to advanced concepts, to make visually compelling web pages.

instructor.name: Chitra Prakash
instructor.bio: Chitra Prakash is an experienced web designer known for her deep understanding of user interface design and style. She brings a detail-oriented approach to her online classes.

title: JavaScript for Beginners
creator: P S Aakash
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to JavaScript, helping you understand how to make your websites interactive.

instructor.name: P S Aakash
instructor.bio: With a background in both front-end and back-end technologies, P S Aakash enjoys teaching with a focus on practical applications of JavaScript.

title: PHP for Beginners
creator: Ashraf Asif
description: Explore the basics of PHP for server-side programming, covering essential concepts needed to build dynamic web pages.

instructor.name: Ashraf Asif
instructor.bio: Ashraf Asif brings his extensive experience in PHP development to his teaching, helping students learn to build robust and efficient web applications.
